scripts.install-precommit:
if [ -f .git/hooks/pre-commit ]; then echo 'Not overwriting .git/hooks/pre-commit'; else echo '#!/bin/sh
yarn run precommit' > .git/hooks/pre-commit && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-commit; echo 'Added .git/hooks/pre-commit'; fi
scripts.lint-fix: yarn tsc --noEmit && yarn eslint . --fix && yarn prettier --write .
scripts.precommit: if [[ -n $(git ls-files . --exclude-standard --others --modified) ]]; then yarn run lint; else (yarn run lint-fix && git add -A); fi;
scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('yarn') === -1) throw new Error('You must use Yarn to install, not NPM')"
